Pretty good! My roses are finally blooming!
That's wonderful! I just planted some tomatoes myself.
I bet they will! You're a natural with plants.
Thank you! Say, have you been listening to any good music lately?
Actually, yes! I've been listening to this new classical composer, it's really moving.
I love classical music! It just has this power to evoke such strong emotions.
Exactly! Like, it can make you feel happy, sad, nostalgic... all at once.
It's amazing how music can do that.
